body_html:
Hi Asimshankar;

tks for follow up. I guess I figured out the issue basically i tried to start the data with np.nan for the dataset. with cache and repeat, for some reason, the value of np.nan is changed by the program sometimes and my code can not detect the np.nan which i used it to mark the new batch as there is no such api with the repeat dataset indicates the end of one cycle.

i used additional data with the number to detect and it works now.

the issue is the repeat cache dataset changes the value of np.nan sometimes.

Jian

body:
Hi Asimshankar;

tks for follow up. I guess I figured out the issue basically i tried to start the data with np.nan for the dataset. with cache and repeat, for some reason, the value of np.nan is changed by the program sometimes and my code can not detect the np.nan which i used it to mark the new batch as there is no such api with the repeat dataset indicates the end of one cycle.

i used additional data with the number to detect and it works now. 

the issue is the repeat cache dataset changes the value of np.nan sometimes.

Jian
